Text.val: 02.12.2013 SH SCR18534 BCM414C Replaced v:FACTOR by V.CREDITMARGINCORRH / V.CREDITMARGINH (to prevent rounding diff.)
28.11.2013 SH SCR18534 BCM414C Added test V.ACTUALINVESTMENTH < V.EXTERNALLIMIT to calculate correction credit margin
20.11.2013 SH SCR18534 BCM414C Fixed bug in RSDH selection where row are updated (multiple rows now)
04.11.2013 GB SCR18493 Moved calculation the RSDH_FINANCEONMARKCODES RSDH_MAXFINANCE before the RSDH_MAXFINANCE
22.07.2013 AS SCR#18227 moved calculation of RSDH_MAXFINANCE
24.06.2013 GB SCR18227 BCM414D: Changed calculation for the RSDH_REQUIREDFUNDING
10.05.2013 SH SCR17839 BCM414A/D Added new RSDH fields for update (RSDH_STOCKFINANCE/_ARRANGEMENTS/_FINANCEONMARKCODES)
07.02.2013 GB SCR17941 Added update the RSDH_PAYMENTSETTLEMENT
-- Select the clients where the invoices are booked
-- Select the clients rows of the syndicate participants.
-- Finally send an email to the initiator that the DB updates are ready

SQL_STMT_U.val: Delete from :1/RSDI where RSDI_RSDH_ADMNO = :2 and RSDI_RSDH_CLNTNO = :3 and RSDI_RSDH_DATE = ':4'
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVA_ACTASPECIAL) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVA join :1/INVO on INVO_NO = INVA_NO and INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 where INVA_CURRENCY = ':4' for fetch only

select cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAEXTRAFIN) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':2' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 and ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :4 for fetch only

select RSDH_CURRENCY, cast(sum(RSDH_ACTUALINVESTMENT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(RSDH_CREDITMARGIN) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(RSDH_EXTERNALLIMIT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/RSDH where RSDH_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and RSDH_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and RSDH_DATE = ':4' group by RSDH_CURRENCY order by RSDH_CURRENCY for fetch only
select cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':2' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 and ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :4 for fetch only
